item.title: Intel interview
item.description: alt text Do you want to work for Intel ? If you are curious, here is the test I did. You are supposed to do it online and you have 2 hours. Unfortunately I donâ€™t remember exactly the question I had. Training test Find a palindrome in an array A is the array N is the size There were other special condition that I forgot, sorry. Example: A={-1,3,-4,5,1,-6,2,1}; You can return 1 because
